title: Prisons Dept says mob attacked a bus transporting inmates
body_lines: A bus carrying a group of prisoners was attacked by a mob last evening (May 09), says the Commissioner-General of Prisons.
Reportedly, the inmates were being transported to the Watareka Rehabilitation Camp following training at construction sites at the time of the attack.
According to the prisons chief, three jailors and 10 prisoners who sustained injuries in the attack were hospitalized.
